text:
â”€ So, it seems the next shoot
is planned for early morning.

I'll have to pick you up before dawn,
is that okay?

Y-Yes, that's perfectly fine...
I'll make sure to go to bed earlier than usual the night before...

I'll try to be awake by the
time Producer-san arrives...

Haha, thank you! But don't push yourself too hard.
You can sleep in the car if you feel tired on the way.

Y-Yes...
If I feel sleepy, I'll take you up on that offer...

...Thank you for always being
considerate, Producer-san.

No problem, ensuring you're in the best
condition for work is my responsibility.

And if you're comfortable and enjoying your
work, naturally, we'll capture great shots, right?

...Yes!
I'll do my best to excel in my work!
